title: Let's Go, ASMR!
description: Soohyun, who runs a popular ASMR channel, scouts some new recruits to help him film and produce videos. There’s Joonhyuk, an ASMR fan, Hyesoo, who has an amazing voice (but who only joins because he’s got a huge crush on Joonhyuk), and Chanyoung, who joins to protect (?) Joonhyuk from Hyesoo. From the creator of “Voice of Love” comes a new BL series full of budding romance and tingles!
